Sentencas: In the distributed power generation market, Solid Oxide Fuel Cell-Gas Turbine (SOFC-GT) hybrids are an attractive option.
Titulo: Thermoeconomic analysis of SOFC-GT hybrid systems fed by liquid fuels

Sentencas: Prototypes are being tested around the world with different types of fuel, but mainly natural gas.
Titulo: Thermoeconomic analysis of SOFC-GT hybrid systems fed by liquid fuels

Sentencas: In this publication, a study of SOFC-GT hybrids for operation with liquid fuels is presented.
Titulo: Thermoeconomic analysis of SOFC-GT hybrid systems fed by liquid fuels

Sentencas: Two liquid fuels were investigated, methanol and kerosene, in four layouts, taking into account different fuel processing strategies.
Titulo: Thermoeconomic analysis of SOFC-GT hybrid systems fed by liquid fuels

Sentencas: A 500 kW class hybrid system (HS) was analysed.
Titulo: Thermoeconomic analysis of SOFC-GT hybrid systems fed by liquid fuels

Sentencas: Web-based ThermoEconomic Modular Program (WTEMP) software, developed by the Thermochemical Power Group of the University of Genoa, was used for the thermodynamic and investment analysis.
Titulo: Thermoeconomic analysis of SOFC-GT hybrid systems fed by liquid fuels

Sentencas: Performance was calculated based on zero-dimensional component models.
Titulo: Thermoeconomic analysis of SOFC-GT hybrid systems fed by liquid fuels

Sentencas: The economic assessment was performed with a through-life cost analysis approach.
Titulo: Thermoeconomic analysis of SOFC-GT hybrid systems fed by liquid fuels

Sentencas: The cost of the conventional components was calculated with WTEMP cost equations.
Titulo: Thermoeconomic analysis of SOFC-GT hybrid systems fed by liquid fuels

Sentencas: As a final result, methanol-fuelled HSs are shown to stand out for both their thermodynamic and economic performance.
Titulo: Thermoeconomic analysis of SOFC-GT hybrid systems fed by liquid fuels
